sentences.sContent: I’ve been tossing and turning all night.

synos.tran: 投掷；摇荡；投掷的距离；掷币赌胜负
投掷；使…不安；突然抬起；使…上下摇动；与…掷币打赌
辗转；被乱扔；颠簸；掷钱币决定某事

phrases.pCn: 辗转反侧；翻来覆去难以入睡
对(决定)提出异议(或辩论)；争论已决定的事，作无谓的争执
抛硬币决定问题；掷硬币猜正反面的赌博
掷钱币决胜负；匆匆准备

remMethod.val: 气得我想把老板(boss)扔(toss)出去

trans.tranCn: 掷钱币来决定；翻来覆去
trans.tranOther: to keep changing your position in bed because you cannot sleep

trans.tranCn: 扔，抛，掷；猛抬；拌；掷；使摇动，使颠簸
trans.tranOther: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

trans.tranCn: 掷钱币来决定； 猛抬头
trans.tranOther: the act of throwing a coin in the air to decide something, especially who will do something first in a game
